generalAbout.body: For best results, gently massage a generous amount into freshly cleansed skin up to three times daily.

Essence Of Argan’s nutrient-rich formulas ensure essential moisture and nourishment. Our meticulously crafted skincare products can be used to revitalize ailments including acne, fine lines, dryness, eczema, psoriasis, scars, stretch marks and rashes.

generalAbout.body: Gently massage desired amount into wet hair and scalp, rinse and repeat up to three times weekly.

Argan Oil’s essential Omega 3 and Omega 9 fatty acids penetrate hair, correcting damaged follicles and increasing overall luster. This non-greasy formula tames frizz, aides dry scalp and strengthens weak strands.

generalAbout.body: Apply desired amount to lips daily
Our organically sourced Argan Oil provides luxurious, transformative benefits to lips, including deep hydration and nourishment.

generalAbout.body: This nutrient-rich oil complements sweet and savory foods alike. Blend with honey or chocolate, drizzle over vegetables, salads, sauces and more.
Used for thousands of years in the kitchen, Argan Oil possesses a rich flavor and dense nutrients, which may play a part in preventing cancer, heart disease and obesity.
